decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
"the rear projections comprising the kitchen / dining / living rooms which have been changed from a highly glazed timber frame construction to brick / cavity / block walls with bi-fold doors.

The amendment to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and would not constitute a material change to the appearance of the dwelling. A fresh planning application is not required.

The applicant is informed that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above and shown on drawing number listed on the application form, and  not to any other deviation from the approved drawings. Furthermore this amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved applicatio
description: Application for a non-material amendment of planning permission ref: P1189.20 dated 31/01/2022 to allow alterations for improved thermal performance (1 x three storey, 6-bed detached dwelling, 3 x three storey, 5-bed detached dwellings, with associated parking and amenity space involving demolition of existing care home)
